headline: ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ServiceNow, Inc. on Rijnberk InvestInsights’s Substack by Daan | InvestInsights. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NOW. ServiceNow, Inc. ‘s share was trading at $879.94 as of August 25th. NOW’s trailing and forward P/E were 110.68 and 52.63 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. ServiceNow (NOW) has […]

headline: Exiger Wins AI Company of the Year in STEVIE® Awards for Technology Excellence
summary: Exiger, the market-leading supply chain AI company and largest provider of supply chain technology to the U.S. Federal Government, has been named a winner of the Silver® Award for Artificial Intelligence Company of the Year in the second annual Stevie Awards for Technology Excellence. Exiger was recognized alongside fellow enterprise software and advanced technology leaders, including Amazon / Amazon Web Services, Google, IBM, Meta, Microsoft, Nvidia, Oracle, Salesforce, and ServiceNow.

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Launches AI Training Program With SENAI-SP in Brazil
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On August 21, ServiceNow and SENAI-SP, Latin America’s largest technical education institution, announced a statewide training and certification program at the annual ServiceNow São Paulo Summit. The program, launched via ServiceNow University, will offer Brazilians the skills they need to succeed […]
